name: PostoperativeFluidAndSoftTissueChanges
title: Postoperative fluid and soft tissue changes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with Postoperative fluid and soft tissue changes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Postoperative fluid and soft tissue changes.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with Postoperative fluid and soft tissue changes are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Postoperative fluid and soft tissue changes are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-9 are also excluded from the value set.)
